```{r}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(1)
```

## Z-Score Function

```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(30, mean = 5, sd = 3)

# computing z-scores
(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)
```

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
  
}

z_scores(x_vec)
```

Using z_scores with other things. These should give errors.

```{r, error = TRUE}
z_scores(3)
z_scores("my_name_is_aj")
z_scores(mtcars)
z_scores(c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE))
```

Revising z_scores

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Input must be numeric")
  }
  
  if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("Input must have at least numbers")
  }
    
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
  
}

z_scores(x_vec)
```
